alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 03 at 2:59AM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills and strong winds expected. Wind chills dropping to between 40 to 50 below zero. Northwest wind gusts between 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...The eastern slopes of the Berkshires. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 1 PM EST Saturday. The lowest wind chills will occur tonight into mid-morning Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest wind gusts between 40 and 55 mph today and tonight. Winds this strong may lead to isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
